mapper.select: SELECT concat(left(brandName, 1), cineCode) as cineCode FROM (SELECT brandName, CASE WHEN cineCode>=0 AND cineCode<10 THEN concat('00', cineCode) WHEN cineCode>=10 AND cineCode<100 THEN concat('0', cineCode) ELSE '' END AS cineCode FROM (SELECT brandName, IFNULL(MAX(cineCode),0) + 1 as cineCode FROM (SELECT count(cineName) as cineCode, brandName FROM cinemaTable WHERE brandName=#{brandName}) as AA) as BB) as CC
